content.question: If <math alttext="y squared, minus x squared, equals 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></math>, then <math alttext="the second derivative of y with respect to x equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mo>=</mo></mrow></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator y minus x, and denominator x squared, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator x squared, minus y squared, and denominator x squared, times y, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>y</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator y squared, minus x squared, and denominator y cubed, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator y squared, minus x squared, and denominator y cubed, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
